docna.cdata!:
Mauritania - Sonader Technical Assistance
            Project : Credit 0694 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mauritania - Sonader Technical
            Assistance Project : Credit 0694 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Mauritania - Sonader Technical Assistance
            Project : Credit 0694 - Special Action Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mauritania - Sonader Technical
            Assistance Project : Credit 0694 - Special Action Credit
            Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed three-year program of
            technical assistance would consist of: (i) seven expatriate
            experts and seven Mauritanian professionals to strengthen
            the organizational structures of SONADER, to identify and
            prepare rural projects, and to take over the execution of a
            few ongoing irrigation projects; (ii) short term consultant
            services to carry out studies on the Gorgol project and on
            special topics (such as training) to be determined in the
            course of project implementation; and (iii) acquisition of
            equipment, vehicles and related operating costs (including fuel).
